<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Rope Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=2737) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Golden League Xun](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=93)

**Prerequisites**
[Golden League Xun Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2734); Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Ropes are your tool of choice, and you deploy them in versatile ways. When [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) a rope, you move 5 more feet on a success and 10 more feet on a critical success, to a maximum of your Speed. This additional movement stacks with the effects of [Quick Climb](/Feats.aspx?ID=821).

 In addition, you can use a rope to hamper your foes. When holding a rope, you can attempt an Athletics check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) a creature up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. If you critically fail such a check while holding a rope, you can drop the rope to take the effects of a failure instead of a critical failure.
name: Rope Mastery
prerequisite: Golden League Xun Dedication; Expert in Athletics
